name: Resonance: Rhythm in You
description:
In a distant part of existence, neither near nor far, lies a land of relative insignificance. Here, within a kingdom ruled by tyranny, a man discovers the music within us all.

Resonance: Rhythm in You is the first title by the upcoming studio Resonance Games. Follow the story of our nameless Hero as he traverses the town of Zephra, a place that is no stranger to hardship. After stumbling upon a mysterious power, however, the world will unravel into unforgettable quirky characters and beats from a variety of genres.

Engage in Resonance's completely unique musical battle system, inspired by RPG combat systems and driven by the beat. Explore the world, interacting with a variety of characters and get a taste for the narrative-rich world we hope to develop.

We're considering this the 'alpha prototype', an experience that hopes to capture the essence of what Resonance: Rhythm in You hopes to become. We've begun finding people for the team, developing our business model and getting work done on concept art and our eventual pixel-art aesthetic. Please keep in mind that most of the assets in this alpha prototype are placeholder, and meant to give you, the player, a reliable sense of what we are aiming for.

We hope you'll leave a comment with your feedback, and if you're interested, join us on our Facebook group at:
https://www.facebook.com/resonancegamescommunity
or follow Resonance Games' founder on twitter @Trinity_Xtreme (we are currently working to build a Discord community and a website too!).

In a world slipping into the monotony of silence, can you hear the music?
